note:
Regenerative Entrepreneur, Co-Founder of Squads.com, Voedselboskabouters.nl. I know my way around computers, trees, physics, fungi a little bit. I'm not so good with humans and other domestic animals, but I'll try to be nice.

remember: not following back, filtering, muting, or blocking is not considered offensive. Happy to help with that ;)
